def_cn: 狮子宫，狮子座（黄道十二宫之一。出生于7月23日至8月22日之间的人属此星座）
def_en: Leo is one of the twelve signs of the zodiac. Its symbol is a lion. People who are born approximately between the 23rd of July and the 22nd of August come under this sign.

def_cn: 出生于狮子宫时段的人
def_en: A Leo is a person whose sign of the zodiac is Leo.
